name: Panel de Pico
description:
My first PICO-8 project! The goal of this project is to learn Lua and development for PICO-8, by trying to recreate Panel de Pon.

I am nowhere near done with this project, but it's playable! So have fun playing and if you feel like it; please leave me some feedback :)

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move cursor
  • Z: Swap panels
  • X: Raise panels
